description: '''Balani show''' or '''ambience''' is an [[electronic dance music]] genre endemic to [[ Mali]]. Stemming from eponymous 'Balani Show' [[block parties]], the Balani show music genre combines elements of [[African popular music|African dance music]] genres like [[kuduro]] and [[coupé-décalé]] with the musical traditions of [[Griot#Musical_instruments_used_by_griots|Griot instrumentalists]].
